actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to abolish the Commission for Extension of the U.S. Capitol, to repeal the authority for the extension of the west central front of the U.S. Capitol.

summary.text: Abolishes the Commission for Extension of the United States Capitol. Terminates the authority for the extension of the west-central front of the United States Capitol. (Amends 40 U.S.C. 166, note)

titles.title: A bill to abolish the Commission for Extension of the U.S. Capitol, to repeal the authority for the extension of the west central front of the U.S. Capitol.
